name: Infantasy
description:
Run around the playground collecting goodies, but don't get caught by the other children!

Made in one day for the 'Don't Use The Playground' Game Jam. The jam was two days long, but I only came in halfway through, so there isn't much polish on this game. I hope you enjoy it all the same!

All art and code was purpose-made by me for this jam. Background music is courtesy of ANtarcticbreeze (patreon.com/antarcticbreeze).

Thanks so much to the DUPT team. Especially Cisco!
